c1.name: A Lady's Rules for Keeping a Courteous Distance
c1.descriptionRaw: Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed when Navia uses <color=#FFD780FF>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> will restore 3 Energy to her and decrease the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> by 1s. Up to 9 Energy can be gained this way, and the CD of "As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute" can be decreased by up to 3s.
c1.description: Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed when Navia uses Ceremonial Crystalshot will restore 3 Energy to her and decrease the CD of As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute by 1s. Up to 9 Energy can be gained this way, and the CD of "As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute" can be decreased by up to 3s.

c2.name: The President's Pursuit of Victory
c2.descriptionRaw:
Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed will increase the CRIT Rate of this <color=#FFD780FF>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> instance by 12%. CRIT Rate can be increased by up to 36% in this way.
In addition, when Ceremonial Crystalshot hits an opponent, one Cannon Fire Support shot from <color=#FFD780FF>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> will strike near the location of the hit. Up to one instance of Cannon Fire Support can be triggered each time Ceremonial Crystalshot is used, and DMG dealt by said Cannon Fire Support this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
c2.description:
Each stack of Crystal Shrapnel consumed will increase the CRIT Rate of this Ceremonial Crystalshot instance by 12%. CRIT Rate can be increased by up to 36% in this way.
In addition, when Ceremonial Crystalshot hits an opponent, one Cannon Fire Support shot from As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute will strike near the location of the hit. Up to one instance of Cannon Fire Support can be triggered each time Ceremonial Crystalshot is used, and DMG dealt by said Cannon Fire Support this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

c3.name: Businesswoman's Broad Vision
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Ceremonial Crystalshot by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Oathsworn Never Capitulate
c4.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> hits an opponent, that opponent's <color=#FFE699FF>Geo RES</color> will be decreased by 20% for 8s.
c4.description: When As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute hits an opponent, that opponent's Geo RES will be decreased by 20% for 8s.

c5.name: Negotiator's Resolute Negotiations
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Flexible Finesse of the Spina's President
c6.descriptionRaw: If more than 3 stacks of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed when using <color=#FFD780FF>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color>, each stack consumed beyond the first 3 increases the CRIT DMG of that Ceremonial Crystalshot by 45%, and any stacks consumed beyond the first 3 are returned to Navia.
c6.description: If more than 3 stacks of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed when using Ceremonial Crystalshot, each stack consumed beyond the first 3 increases the CRIT DMG of that Ceremonial Crystalshot by 45%, and any stacks consumed beyond the first 3 are returned to Navia.
